Key Match Events: Katic (24') and Kolasinac (60') scored for Bosnia-Herzegovina
Pre-Game Insights: Bosnia-Herzegovina and Hungary will look to claim their first win of the 2024-25 UEFA Nations League
Bosnia-Herzegovina are leading Group A3 with one point, while Hungary are one point better off in third position
Bosnia-Herzegovina are searching for their first victory over Hungary after failing to win any of their previous five head-to-head meetings
Post-Match Reflections: Hungary's winless run in the Nations League has been extended to four matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bosnia-Herzegovina are unable to call upon Adrian Leon Barisic and Ermedin Demirovic due to yellow card accumulation
Hungary are unable to call upon Loic Nego, Milos Kerkez, and Krisztofer Horvath due to injury
Others: The match took place at Stadion Bilino Polje in Zenica, Bosnia-Herzegovina
The match ended with a score of 0-2 in favor of Hungary
